message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $145. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we try $160?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $152. Would you be willing to come down to that price?
I'm still a bit above your target, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit more. How about we try $158?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $155? I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
I'm getting close to your target, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit more. How about we try $157?
I think we're really close now, Alice. How about we try $154? I'm willing to meet you halfway one last time.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I think we're close enough. How about we meet in the middle at $156?
I appreciate your time and effort, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to walk away if I don't get a good deal. How about we meet at $153? This is my final offer.
